SELECT a.booking_id AS bookingId , a.final_payment , c.title as strfTitle , d.pic_name AS strfPics , c.close_check AS checkOut , c.open_check AS checkIn
FROM booking a JOIN menu b ON a.menu_id = b.menu_id JOIN stay_tour_ restaur_fest c ON b.strf_id = c.strf_id JOIN strf_pic d ON b.strf_id = d.strf_id WHERE a.user_id = a.user_id AND a.check_out > NOW();

SELECT b.booking_id AS bookingId, s.title AS strfTitle, b.check_in AS checkIn, b.check_out AS checkOut, m.price AS menuPrice, DATE_FORMAT(b.check_in, '%Y년 %m월 %d일 (%W) %H:%i') AS checkInFormatted, DATE_FORMAT(b.check_out, '%Y년 %m월 %d일 (%W) %H:%i') AS checkOutFormatted, IF(r.review_id IS NULL, '리뷰 작성', '리뷰 조회') AS reviewStatus FROM booking b JOIN menu m ON b.menu_id = m.menu_id JOIN stay_tour_restaur_fest s ON m.strf_id = s.strf_id LEFT JOIN review r ON r.booking_id = b.booking_id WHERE b.check_out <= NOW();
